start.tip_text: Click here to set-up the simulation.

guide.tip_text: Click here to open the project's GitHub page.

play.tip_text: Click here to start the simulation.

resume.tip_text: Click here to resume the simulation.

pause.tip_text: Click here to pause the simulation.

stop.tip_text: Click here to stop the simulation.

fast.tip_text: Click here to fast-forward the simulation.

reset.tip_text: Click here to reset the grid.

guide_bis.tip_text: Click here to open the project's GitHub page.

difficulty.tip_text: Click here to toggle the user difficulty level.

save.tip_text: Click here to save the current state.

load.tip_text: Click here to load a savestate.
